derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French sanatif or late Latin sanativus, from Latin sanare 'to cure'

means.word_mean: 1. tending to cure or restore to health;

sentences.sentence: "a sanative environment of mountains and fresh air"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 患精神病的,精神病患者的,极愚蠢的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+sane神志清醒的→adj.患精神病的,精神病患者的,极愚蠢的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 治疗病症的, 有益于健康的

sanat=san健康的+orium场所→健康的场所
san健康的+ity表名词→n.神志清楚
